author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
DEFIANCE is almost here! HALO has a new faction in the form of renegade Brutes and Elites that have come storming into the battlefield. With a new Points Match system for big games with no respawn, new guns and units, Defiance adds a whole new dimension to the HALO game.  Take command of a Squad of Spartans in Red or Blue and throw down in familiar game modes in HALO: Flashpoint, based on the Deadzone system.

Thanks to Mantic for the complimentary copy of the box to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.gg/CCmeRy3

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/g
title: GMG Reviews - HALO Flashpoint: Defiance  by Mantic Games

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
28mag has been the source for all things Grimdark for the last half decade; so there's a beautiful coffee-table edition pulling it all together going to backers now from my buddy Dave Taylor and the 28Crew. Patron Matt Bair was kind enough to send along an extra copy so we could all check it out!

Get 28Mag HERE: https://28-mag.com/
